name: cendertron-fc
description: 基于 Cendertron 的 Serverless FC

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && ./scripts/download-chrome.sh && cp headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: rm -rf package.zip && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/logs && cp -r index.js dist && cp -r lib dist && cp -r package.json dist && cp -r template.yml dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production

author: wx-chevalier
